title: Хамелеон
overview: The audience is immersed in the complicated story of Zoia, who came to conquer Kyiv. But from the first day, the capital begins to test the girl's strength, throwing up one trouble after another. Zoia finds herself in the epicenter of secrets and dangerous adventures that are tied to her ex-boyfriend Sasha. The girl must find all the unknowns to guess the mysterious equation.On the way to the solution, Zoia will meet loyal friends and sworn enemies. Love, intrigue and constant intrigues will not even allow you to take a breath, but thanks to her humor and stubbornness, she will move towards the goal. Is this enough to reveal the secret and is Zoia ready for a crime?
